mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.channel_id AS "channelId", a.goods_type_id AS "goodsTypeId", a.price AS "price", a.modify_user AS "modifyUser", a.modify_time AS "modifyTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_channel_pack_fee( id, channel_id, goods_type_id, price, modify_user, modify_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{channelId}, #{goodsTypeId}, #{price}, #{modifyUser}, #{modifyTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_channel_pack_fee SET channel_id = #{channelId}, goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId}, price = #{price}, modify_user = #{modifyUser}, modify_time = #{modifyTime} WHERE id = #{id}
